name: Processing
longDesc: A sparsely decorated room.  A metal hatch is here on the South wall, but it appears to be locked.  There is a strange tubular device next to the door, which might affect the hatch.  The metal door to the East leads back to the hallway.
shortDesc: This is a sparsely decorated room.  A metal hatch is here on the South wall, but it appears to be locked.  There is a device next to the door. There is a door back to the hallway to the East.
feat1desc: A rounded metal hatch.  It seems to be connected to the device next to it.
feat1interactSuccess: With a loud creak, the hatch reluctantly opens up.  You see daylight outside.
feat1interactComplete: The hatch is open.  The outside air is right in front of you.
feat1interactFail: You are unable to open the hatch.  Perhaps the device will unlock it?
feat2desc: This device is a long cylindrical tube.  It is too dark to see what is inside of it, but you could probably reach inside.
feat2interactOptions: put hand in, stick hand in, put arm in, stick arm in, insert hand, insert arm
feat2interactSuccess: You reluctantly stick your arm into the device.  You can feel a handle at the end of it.
feat2interactFail: You are unable to use the device.
feat3desc: You can't see it, but you can feel the handle deep inside the tube.  It feels like it can be pulled out towards you.
feat3interactSuccess: You pull the handle out towards you.  It moves slowly at first, then suddenly there is a loud click and the handle stops.  You release the handle and retract your arm.  It appears to have locked a metal bracelet around your wrist.
feat4desc: A metal bracelet you seem to have acquired when trying to use the device.  It looks like you can rotate the numbers on it like a combination lock, but it seems to have ten digits.  Printed on the bracelet is 'Northern Medical Research Center, phone: (217) 335-1251'
feat4interactSuccess: You enter the code into the bracelet.  You pull at it none-too-gently and it falls off your wrist.
feat4interactComplete: The bracelet lies on the floor.  Good riddance.
feat4interactFail: It doesn't work.  You can't get the bracelet off.
feat5desc: A metal door leading back to the hallway.
